title: Team Rubiks
body:
OK LISTEN UP!!!!!  I have a full team, I need a substitute for Mid, adc, jungle, and top. So if someone wants to substitute for one of those roles, then you can. Fill out this form:

How old are you?

What rank?

What state do you live in? (North american team.) 

What's your IQ? http://www.free-iqtest.net/

replies.body:
How old are you? 19

What rank? Gold 5

What role? I can do any role except jungle.

What state do you live in? (North american team.) IN

What is your IQ: 167 (test was a joke)

How old are you? 21

What rank? Silver 5 Adc or Jungler. Can play both exceptionally well. Also have great map awareness and Shotcalling

What state do you live in? (North american team.) Florida

What rank are you? S1

What role do you want to play? Sup/Mid/ADC

will you not quit the team even when I make you a substitute? I will not quit if the team is dedicated (if the team gets together 3+ times a week i wont leave)

Do you understand the important things? (Split pushing, balanced teams, etc.) Yes

How old are you? (Be Honest cause this team will skype and/or curse voice.) 19

Why do you want to be on this team? I want a group of people to play with and for people to give feedback so I can become a better player. I could write pages on this but I wanted to keep it brief.

> [{quoted}](name=FrozenWaters,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-04-18T21:24:32.188+0000)
>
> What rank are you? S1
> 
> What role do you want to play? Sup/Mid/ADC
> 
> will you not quit the team even when I make you a substitute? I will not quit if the team is dedicated (if the team gets together 3+ times a week i wont leave)
> 
> Do you understand the important things? (Split pushing, balanced teams, etc.) Yes
> 
> How old are you? (Be Honest cause this team will skype and/or curse voice.) 19
> 
> Why do you want to be on this team? I want a group of people to play with and for people to give feedback so I can become a better player. I could write pages on this but I wanted to keep it brief.

We already have a support, and a mid laner, and I am the adc. If you want to be a subsitute for Mid or Adc let me know :)

> [{quoted}](name=SnopesRez,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-04-19T01:42:41.500+0000)
>
> We already have a support, and a mid laner, and I am the adc. If you want to be a subsitute for Mid or Adc let me know :)

Ya this team woulda been a waste of time if you are in charge of it.

> [{quoted}](name=SnopesRez,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-04-19T01:42:41.500+0000)
>
> We already have a support, and a mid laner, and I am the adc. If you want to be a subsitute for Mid or Adc let me know :)

Oh, is that so. idc if i sub or not. if u want me ill play otherwise your loss.

> [{quoted}](name=FrozenWaters,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2016-04-20T23:15:07.900+0000)
>
> Oh, is that so. idc if i sub or not. if u want me ill play otherwise your loss.

You can substitute. I need to see you play a couple of games.

What rank are you? 
I'm currently B2, but I was S4 last season and I'm getting ready to start the climb

What role do you want to play? 
I'm dedicated to ADC'ing, though I can mid fairly well.

will you not quit the team even when I make you a substitute? 
Nope. If I want to, I'll just find another team to play with in the down time.

Do you understand the important things? (Split pushing, balanced teams, etc.)
Yep. I have a very safe lanning phase and generally just freeze it and farm all game.

How old are you? (Be Honest cause this team will skype and/or curse voice.)
17 as of April 8th.

Why do you want to be on this team? And what state do you live in?
Why? Because League is boring to play alone. I live in Ga.

> [{quoted}](name=Sno1ock,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-04-20T02:34:08.571+0000)

> 17 as of April 8th.
> 
> Why do you want to be on this team? And what state do you live in?
> Why? Because League is boring to play alone. I live in Ga.

Hello, I need a jungle, but you can substitute for ADC if you want. I already have my primarys but the jungle might be kicked out

What rank are you? Gold 3

What role do you want to play? Bot lane AD pref

will you not quit the team even when I make you a substitute? I would assume even if i was a sub I still get to scrim against the main team, so i wouldnt leave

Do you understand the important things? (Split pushing, balanced teams, etc.) Yes

How old are you? (Be Honest cause this team will skype and/or curse voice.) 14

Why do you want to be on this team? And what state do you live in? I want o be on this team because I want a feel of the team environment since solo q can get so tedious. Washington

> [{quoted}](name=Kobymao,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-04-20T01:24:57.770+0000)

Ok, I already have a full team, if you want to be a substitute ADC then you can :) just msg me

Hey we are looking for someone to run and start a silver-gold team for our gaming community. We are Zero-Fear Gaming (ZFG) and I was wondering if you wouldn't mind joining and create your ranked team in our team speak. We offer you a Team Speak to run your team with, along with your own channel. You will be able to run the team however you want, with practices, try-outs, etc. Just message me if you are interested. We can help get players to you that you can tryout for your team. My IGN: RedRangerrrr and the team speak is : zero-feargaming.typefrag.com

> [{quoted}](name=RedRangerrrr,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-04-18T20:21:25.448+0000)
>
> Hey we are looking for someone to run and start a silver-gold team for our gaming community. We are Zero-Fear Gaming (ZFG) and I was wondering if you wouldn't mind joining and create your ranked team in our team speak. We offer you a Team Speak to run your team with, along with your own channel. You will be able to run the team however you want, with practices, try-outs, etc. Just message me if you are interested. We can help get players to you that you can tryout for your team. My IGN: RedRangerrrr and the team speak is : zero-feargaming.typefrag.com

Yo' man, I have my full team, and I challenge you. If you accept to ZFG vs RBK then add me, my summ is SnopesRez.

> [{quoted}](name=RedRangerrrr,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-04-18T20:21:25.448+0000)
>
> Hey we are looking for someone to run and start a silver-gold team for our gaming community. We are Zero-Fear Gaming (ZFG) and I was wondering if you wouldn't mind joining and create your ranked team in our team speak. We offer you a Team Speak to run your team with, along with your own channel. You will be able to run the team however you want, with practices, try-outs, etc. Just message me if you are interested. We can help get players to you that you can tryout for your team. My IGN: RedRangerrrr and the team speak is : zero-feargaming.typefrag.com

No thank you. Thanks for the offer. Btw we should vs each other. ZFG vs RBK yeah?

What rank are you? Bronze IV (even though I am a lower rank, I'm a very serious player, committed to my own growth as well as the growth of my teammates. I believe that I can bring skills to the team that will help benefit the team as a whole.)

What role do you want to play? I am a very serious top laner. 

will you not quit the team even when I make you a substitute? No I will not. I believe that if you are put as a substitute, it's just another opportunity for you to prove yourself as a player and show the team what you really are capable of. 

Do you understand the important things? (Split pushing, balanced teams, etc.) I am very familiar with different team comps, champ synergy, and different strats for winning games and taking advantages to win. 

How old are you? (Be Honest cause this team will skype and/or curse voice.) 15

Why do you want to be on this team? I want to be on this team because I have been looking for somewhere (a team) in which I can prove myself as a player. I believe that Dynamic queue (as a solo player) won't help me evolve and show the community what I truly am. I believe that I can help the team become great and the team can help me grow as a player. I am a very committed player and I try my best every game. Flaming isn't in my success strategy and I believe in looking at the bright side of every situation.

> [{quoted}](name=RandomLaner,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-04-19T14:12:05.389+0000)
>
> What rank are you? Bronze IV (even though I am a lower rank, I'm a very serious player, committed to my own growth as well as the growth of my teammates. I believe that I can bring skills to the team that will help benefit the team as a whole.)
> 
> What role do you want to play? I am a very serious top laner. 
> 
> will you not quit the team even when I make you a substitute? No I will not. I believe that if you are put as a substitute, it's just another opportunity for you to prove yourself as a player and show the team what you really are capable of. 
> 
> Do you understand the important things? (Split pushing, balanced teams, etc.) I am very familiar with different team comps, champ synergy, and different strats for winning games and taking advantages to win. 
> 
> How old are you? (Be Honest cause this team will skype and/or curse voice.) 15
> 
> Why do you want to be on this team? I want to be on this team because I have been looking for somewhere (a team) in which I can prove myself as a player. I believe that Dynamic queue (as a solo player) won't help me evolve and show the community what I truly am. I believe that I can help the team become great and the team can help me grow as a player. I am a very committed player and I try my best every game. Flaming isn't in my success strategy and I believe in looking at the bright side of every situation.

I like you, we are needing a top laner and a jungle, I will play a couple of games with you at 4, I am in New Jersey, and add me, my summ is SnopesRez.

> [{quoted}](name=RandomLaner,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2016-04-19T14:54:17.825+0000)
>
> Hey SnopesRez, my most sincere apologies, but 4pm your time, doesn't work for me, as I have some things that I have to do around then. Would 7 pm your time work for you? That's about 6pm my time, and that would work better for me as I'm free then and I can play as long as needed after. Getting on this team is very important to me, as I can get one step closer to achieving my dream of the big stage. If 7pm doesn't work for you, is there anything else I can do to prove my abilities to you? Thanks.

7pm does work for me, add me and we can 1v1, so I can see you play, You are very dedicated to this team, and I like that :) we will have good teamwork, cause the whole team will be skyping. But listen, we probably have a game already, I do not know if they accepted yet but we could have Zero fear Gaming (ZFG) vs Ream Rubiks (RBK) :D

> [{quoted}](name=EX Black,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=j9syhrRT,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-04-18T19:22:01.267+0000)
>
> What rank are you?: Gold 2
> 
> What role do you want to play?: Mid
> 
> will you not quit the team even when I make you a substitute?: I will work harder to make sure that spot will always be mine.
> 
> Do you understand the important things? (Split pushing, balanced teams, etc.): I do understand most of these concepts
> 
> 
> How old are you? (Be Honest cause this team will Skype and/or curse voice.): 15
> 
> Why do you want to be on this team?: I am looking to go to a big stage one day, whether that be with this team, or another team, I want to make it there. This team looks promising.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I also understand that you have a mid laner, but i would recommend trying people out before making a final choice.
> 
> I also want to be a sub if you still think i'm not good enough.

ok... You are a bit over the rank we wanted, I am afraid you can't come in, Sorry man, gl in your games :)

What rank are you? Bronze V (Highest last year was Silver V but I only practiced in ranked and ended up losing a lot)

What role do you want to play? Support / Shot caller

Will you not quit the team even when I make you a substitute? I will not.

Do you understand the important things? (Split pushing, balanced teams, etc.) Yes. 

How old are you? (Be Honest cause this team will skype and/or curse voice.) 19.

Why do you want to be on this team? I hate being alone playing team games, and have been looking for a gaming family on League like I have on other games that I have been apart of for a long time, all of which I also play support type roles and have consistently been vocal, and I believe my decision making and macro play are good, but also need improvement and a team can help me get better. Among my gaming friends I am known as being very vocal, so that isn't an issue either and am outspoken in my opinions.

Among my gaming friends I am known as being very vocal, so that isn't an issue either and am outspoken in my opinions.

You are accepted as the support. :) Congratulations. Add me my summ is SnopesRez

I want to be on this team because i am really looking to improve and i think some pointers would be nice and i also like being in teams wit active people.

I would accept you, but We already have a mid laner and a support and we are a North American team :/

What rank are you? Diamond 4

What role do you want to play? Support/ ADC

will you not quit the team even when I make you a substitute? No

Do you understand the important things? (Split pushing, balanced teams, etc.) Yes

How old are you? (Be Honest cause this team will skype and/or curse voice.) 21

Why do you want to be on this team? Looking for a group that is serious about climbing, learning, and improving
